abstract: Three rival teams of computer researchers are working on new types of software needed to better use computer chips that can process many tasks at the same time.
snippet: Three rival teams of computer researchers are working on new types of software needed to better use computer chips that can process many tasks at the same time.
lead_paragraph: PALO ALTO, Calif.  In the computer world’s equivalent of “The Amazing Race,” three rival teams of computer researchers are working on new types of software needed to better use computer chips that can process many tasks at the same time.

headline.main: Race Is On to Advance Software for Chips
headline.print_headline: Race Is On To Advance Software For Chips

abstract: The price of ads plummeted for AOL in the first quarter. Time Warner blames the head of its advertising unit who it fired in March. The good news is only 647,000 people canceled their AOL accounts in the quarter, a lower defection rate than it has had in a long time.
snippet: The price of ads plummeted for AOL in the first quarter. Time Warner blames the head of its advertising unit who it fired in March. The good news is only 647,000 people canceled their AOL accounts in the quarter, a lower defection rate than it has...
lead_paragraph: AOL had a shockingly bad first quarter in advertising sales, and the reason was the disarray in its own sales force. Overall ad revenue at AOL was up only 1 percent from a year earlier, its parent company, Time Warner, reported Wednesday. By comparison, ad revenue increased 42 percent at Google, 29 percent at Microsoft and 7 percent at Yahoo (which has its own dissarray.)

headline.main: AOL’s Blame Game: The Guy We Fired Did It
